metadata.Title: CVE-2017-6967 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium
metadata.Description:
xrdp 0.9.1 calls the PAM function auth_start_session() in an incorrectlocation, leading to PAM session modules not being properly initialized,with a potential consequence of incorrect configurations or elevation ofprivileges, aka a pam_limits.so bypass.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-6967` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

xrdp - 0.9.5-2
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: xrdp package in esm-apps/jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.9.5-2').
